title: Need help for puschasing RP
body: I just moved to the US and I want to League of Legends here, but the problem is that I cannot purchase RP with my credit card because it requires a zip code. So I just don't know why they need a zip code, to mail the receipt?

replies.body:
Credit Cards here in the US will have a billing address associated with them. When you purchase products online, they'll generally want the zip code that's attributed to that billing address as a form of confirmation and security. If you have issues with using a zip code, you may want to elect to using another form of payment such as Paypal, which may not require your zip code for purchase.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Thanks a lot!!! Problem is solved now :)
